verses.text: \w This|strong="G5124"\w* \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w also|strong="G1161"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w last|strong="G2078"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w perilous|strong="G5467"\w* \w times|strong="G2540"\w* shall \w come|strong="G1764"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* lovers of their own \w selves|strong="G5367"\w*, \w covetous|strong="G5366"\w*, \w boasters|strong="G0213"\w*, \w proud|strong="G5244"\w*, \w blasphemers|strong="G0989"\w*, \w disobedient|strong="G0545"\w* to \w parents|strong="G1118"\w*, \w unthankful|strong="G0884"\w*, \w unholy|strong="G0462"\w*,

Without natural \w affection|strong="G0794"\w*, \w trucebreakers|strong="G0786"\w*, false \w accusers|strong="G1228"\w*, \w incontinent|strong="G0193"\w*, \w fierce|strong="G0434"\w*, despisers of those that are \w good|strong="G0865"\w*,

\w Traitors|strong="G4273"\w*, \w heady|strong="G4312"\w*, \w highminded|strong="G5187"\w*, lovers of \w pleasures|strong="G5369"\w* \w more|strong="G3123"\w* \w than|strong="G2228"\w* lovers of \w God|strong="G5377"\w*;

\w Having|strong="G2192"\w* a \w form|strong="G3446"\w* of \w godliness|strong="G2150"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w denying|strong="G0720"\w* the \w power|strong="G1411"\w* \w thereof|strong="G0846"\w*: \w from|strong="G0665"\w* \w such|strong="G5128"\w* turn \w away|strong="G0665"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* this \w sort|strong="G5130"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* they which \w creep|strong="G1744"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w houses|strong="G3614"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* lead \w captive|strong="G0162"\w* silly \w women|strong="G1133"\w* \w laden|strong="G4987"\w* with \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*, led \w away|strong="G0071"\w* with \w divers|strong="G4164"\w* \w lusts|strong="G1939"\w*,

\w Ever|strong="G3842"\w* \w learning|strong="G3129"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w never|strong="G3368"\w* \w able|strong="G1410"\w* to \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w knowledge|strong="G1922"\w* of the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w as|strong="G5158"\w* \w Jannes|strong="G2389"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jambres|strong="G2387"\w* \w withstood|strong="G0436"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w*, \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w do|strong="G0436"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w resist|strong="G0436"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*: \w men|strong="G0444"\w* of \w corrupt|strong="G2704"\w* \w minds|strong="G3563"\w*, \w reprobate|strong="G0096"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* they shall \w proceed|strong="G4298"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w further|strong="G4119"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w folly|strong="G0454"\w* shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w manifest|strong="G1552"\w* unto \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add men\add*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w theirs|strong="G1565"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* hast fully \w known|strong="G3877"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1319"\w*, manner of \w life|strong="G0072"\w*, \w purpose|strong="G4286"\w*, \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w longsuffering|strong="G3115"\w*, \w charity|strong="G0026"\w*, \w patience|strong="G5281"\w*,

\w Persecutions|strong="G1375"\w*, \w afflictions|strong="G3804"\w*, \w which|strong="G3634"\w* \w came|strong="G1096"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Antioch|strong="G0490"\w*, \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Iconium|strong="G2430"\w*, \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Lystra|strong="G3082"\w*; \w what|strong="G3634"\w* \w persecutions|strong="G1375"\w* I \w endured|strong="G5297"\w*: \w but|strong="G2532"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \add them\add* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w delivered|strong="G4506"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*.

\w Yea|strong="G1161"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* that \w will|strong="G2309"\w* \w live|strong="G2198"\w* \w godly|strong="G2153"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* shall suffer \w persecution|strong="G1377"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w evil|strong="G4190"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w seducers|strong="G1114"\w* shall \w wax|strong="G4298"\w* worse and \w worse|strong="G5501"\w*, \w deceiving|strong="G4105"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* being \w deceived|strong="G4105"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w continue|strong="G3306"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the things \w which|strong="G3739"\w* thou hast \w learned|strong="G3129"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hast been assured \w of|strong="G4104"\w*, \w knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* \w whom|strong="G5101"\w* thou hast \w learned|strong="G3129"\w* \add them\add*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* a \w child|strong="G1025"\w* thou hast \w known|strong="G1492"\w* the \w holy|strong="G2413"\w* \w scriptures|strong="G1121"\w*, which are \w able|strong="G1410"\w* to \w make|strong="G4679"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* \w wise|strong="G4679"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* which \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w All|strong="G3956"\w* \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w* \add is\add* given by inspiration of \w God|strong="G2315"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add is\add* \w profitable|strong="G5624"\w* \w for|strong="G4314"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1319"\w*, \w for|strong="G4314"\w* \w reproof|strong="G1650"\w*, \w for|strong="G4314"\w* \w correction|strong="G1882"\w*, \w for|strong="G4314"\w* \w instruction|strong="G3809"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*:

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* the \w man|strong="G0444"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* may \w be|strong="G5600"\w* \w perfect|strong="G0739"\w*, throughly \w furnished|strong="G1822"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*.
